Package net.sourceforge.nite.corpus

Interface Summary
CorpusTool Interface to be instantated by all tools that can perform editing or management style tasks at a corpus-wide level.
 

Class Summary
Manager GUI that's the entry point for management of one or more corpora.
PreferenceLoader This is a convenience class that provides a standard location for corpus preferences and backwards compatibility with the old style preferences so people don't lose bookmarks
Preferences This is similar to the search.S class but adds preferences for plugins
